= !OpenDial User Guide =

This user guide explains how to practically employ the !OpenDial toolkit to develop dialogue systems.

 * *[GettingStarted Getting started]*<br>How to compile and start !OpenDial.

 * *[SimpleExample Step-by-step example]*<br>A detailed, step-by-step example of dialogue domain specification for !OpenDial

 * *[DialogueDomains Dialogue domains]* <br>XML encoding format for dialogue domains.

 * *[AdvancedModelling Advanced modelling]* <br>Build-in functionalities for handling nested conditions, variable references, quantification<br> mechanisms, string matching, set-theoretic operations and predictive variables.

 * *[ParameterEstimation Parameter estimation]*<br>How to estimate rule parameters from data.

 * *[BuildingDialogueSystem Building up a complete dialogue system]*<br>How to implement new modules with !OpenDial.

 * *[Javadoc]*<br>!OpenDial API.

<br>
